Name: [Assist] Gate Breaker
Desc: Vital View triggered by Evasive Assist lasts <color=#2BAD00>7</color>s. Defensive Assist inflicts <color=#2BAD00>45%</color> more Daze.
Desc2: Harnessing the power of inertia, this device can help break through a target's defense. Don't forget to release your grip at the right moment, or else you'll go flying off with it.
